thread.title: A weak open for US stocks as investors consider job numbers
thread.title_full: A weak open for US stocks as investors consider job numbers - San Francisco Chronicle

title: A weak open for US stocks as investors consider job numbers
text: Photo: Mark Lennihan, AP 8581022|article-6484571|7 8581022|article-6484571|1 email_share_embed|photo-8581022|article-6484571|1 8581022|article-6484571|2 8581022|article-6484571|3 8581022|article-6484571|4 8581022|article-6484571|5 google_share_embed|photo-8581022|article-6484571|6 FILE - This July 15, 2013 file photo shows the New York Stock Exchange in New York. Global stock markets fell sharply Friday, Sept. 4, 2015, ahead of the release of monthly U.S. jobs figures that could well determine whether the Federal Reserve will raise interest rates later this month, a prospect that's unnerving investors at a time when markets have been so volatile. FILE - This July 15, 2013 file photo shows the New York Stock... NEW YORK (AP) — Stocks are opening lower after two days of gains as traders look over the latest report on the U.S. job market. FILE - This July 15, 2013 file photo shows the New York Stock Exchange in New York. Global stock markets fell sharply Friday, Sept. 4, 2015, ahead of the release of monthly U.S. jobs figures that could well determine whether the Federal Reserve will raise interest rates later this month, a prospect that's unnerving investors at a time when markets have been so volatile. FILE - This July 15, 2013 file photo shows the New York Stock... NEW YORK (AP) — Stocks are opening lower after two days of gains as traders look over the latest report on the U.S. job market.
